remarks: Set of objects of the category of non-unital rings (in a universe). (New usage is discouraged.)  (Contributed by AV, 27-Feb-2020.)
statement:
rngcbasOLD.c $e |- C = ( RngCatOLD ` U ) $.
rngcbasOLD.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
rngcbasOLD.u $e |- ( ph -> U e. V ) $.
rngcbasOLD $p |- ( ph -> B = ( U i^i Rng ) ) $.
